Intro

HLA is a python library for accelerator physics commissioning and experiments. It is developed at NSLS-II, BNL. It is based on EPICS-3/-4 and other general services, e.g. channel finder service, model service and pv service

  >>> import hla
  >>> hla.initNSLS2VSR()
  >>> hla.getOrbit(spos=True)

For the power user, you have full control of each PV

Quick Start

Quick start is for users who have an account on lsasd2.ls.bnl.gov or injdev.nsls2.bnl.gov
